info.title: Datamuse
info.description: Datamuse is a word-finding query engine for developers. You can use it in your apps to find words that match a given set of constraints and that are likely in a given context. You can specify a wide variety of constraints on meaning, spelling, sound, and vocabulary in your queries, in any combination.

get.description: Retrieves a list of words (and multi word expressions) from a given vocabulary that match a given set of constraints.

parameters.name: ml
parameters.description: The results have a meaning related to this string value, which can be any word or sequence of words.

parameters.name: sl
parameters.description: The results are pronounced similarly to this string of characters.

parameters.name: sp
parameters.description: The results are spelled similarly to this string of characters, or that they match a wildcard pattern.

parameters.name: rel_jja
parameters.description: The popular nouns modified by the given adjective.

parameters.name: rel_jjb
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship noun.

parameters.name: rel_syn
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship synonym.

parameters.name: rel_trg
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship triggers.

parameters.name: rel_ant
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship antonyms.

parameters.name: rel_spc
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship direct hypernyms.

parameters.name: rel_gen
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship direct hyponyms.

parameters.name: rel_com
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship direct holonyms.

parameters.name: rel_par
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship direct meronyms.

parameters.name: rel_bga
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship frequent followers.

parameters.name: rel_bgb
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship frequent predecessors.

parameters.name: rel_rhy
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship perfect rhymes.

parameters.name: rel_nry
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship approximate rhymes.

parameters.name: rel_hom
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship homophones.

parameters.name: rel_cns
parameters.description: The predefined lexical relationship consonant match.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: The identifier for the vocabulary to use.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: The optional hint to the system about the theme of the document being written.

parameters.name: lc
parameters.description: The optional hint to the system about the word that appears immediately to the left of the target word in a sentence.

parameters.name: rc
parameters.description: The optional hint to the system about the word that appears immediately to the right of the target word in a sentence.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, not to exceed 1000 (default: 100).

parameters.name: md
parameters.description: The list of single-letter codes (no delimiter) requesting that extra lexical knowledge be included with the results.
